title: Walking in the sunlight, walking in the shadow
creator_credit: Bob Kingsbury, Joe Scully and Australian Commonwealth Film Unit
brief_description: Education and social integration of Northern Territory First Nations peoples. Considers the position of First Nations peoples in Australia, particularly in the Northern areas. Australians in other parts of the country is exposed to the poor social conditions experienced in the newspaper and on television, but how is the situation viewed in the Northern Territory? Includes interviews with those involved and scenes of contemporary First Nations peoples’ lives.
